import { Avatar, Button, Dropdown, Navbar } from 'flowbite-react'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import imgLogo from "../resources/logoOupia.svg"; import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; const Header = () => { const [activeLink, setActiveLink] = useState(''); const handleLinkClick = (isClick) => { setActiveLink(isClick); }; return ( <> handleLinkClick('/')} > handleLinkClick('/')}>
